titleStmt.title: Vaticinium votivum or, Palæmon's prophetick prayer. Lately presented privately to His now Majestie in a Latin poëm; and here published in English. To which is annexed a paraphrase on Paulus Grebnerus's prophecie. With several elegies on Charls the First. The Lord Capel. The Lord Francis Villiers.
titleStmt.author: Grebner, Paul.
Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) contains note: 'doubtful attribution'; see also Lyle H. Kendall, Jr., "Notes on some works attributed to George Wither," The Review of English Studies, n.s. 5/20 (Oct., 1954), 390-394..
The imprint is false; actual place of publication conjectured by Wing.
Leaves A5-8 are intended to be bound between p. 74 and 75.
"Æternæ memoriæ, et sanctis manibus Caroli I" has separate title page dated 1649; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Text in English, French, and Latin.
